content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Mining Operation at (-15, -50)
- Burner mining drill (position -15, -50) connected to wooden chest (position -14.5, -48.5)
- Stone furnace (position -14, -47) processing iron ore into plates
Current status: Mining drill needs fuel, furnace is working with coal fuel

###Copper Smelting Area at (0-6, 0-4)
- Three stone furnaces in a row:
  - Furnace at (0,0) - idle, no ingredients
  - Furnace at (2,0) - idle, no ingredients  
  - Furnace at (4,4) and (6,4) - contain copper plates but idle

###Iron Gear Wheel Assembly at (24.5, 4.5)
- Assembling machine (position 24.5, 4.5)
- Input wooden chest (position 21.5, 4.5)
- Output wooden chest (position 27.5, 4.5) containing 90 iron gear wheels
- Two burner inserters:
  - Input inserter (position 22.5, 4.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
  - Output inserter (position 26.5, 4.5) moving products to output chest
- Electric pole (position 22.5, 6.5) providing power

###Power Generation System
- Steam engine (position 9.5, 19.5) connected to electricity network
- Boiler (position -2.0, 23.5) 
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Network of pipes connecting pump -> boiler -> steam engine
- Electric poles network connecting power to assembling machine

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner devices (mining drills, inserters, boilers)
- Always carry coal in inventory for refueling
- Check fuel status of entities regularly

### Power Connection Issues
- Ensure proper connection between power poles
- Maintain consistent power network coverage
- Place power poles within connection range of powered entities

### Resource Flow Issues
- Monitor input/output inventories to prevent stalling
- Ensure continuous supply of materials to assemblers
- Keep furnaces supplied with both fuel and ore

### Entity Placement Issues
- Clean up pipes and poles before replacing them
- Verify steam engine direction is correct before connecting
- Ensure proper connections between fluid carrying entities (pump-boiler-engine)

### API Usage Errors
- Verify inventory contains items before attempting insertion
- Use correct entity references when picking up items
- Ensure proper object types are used in API calls
